name: One Kombat
description:
Fight with others to be the best fighter of all times. 

Move with: A,S,D,W or Arrow buttons and hit with any H,J,K,L keys, all triggers a random hit action. Jump to avoid hits of enemies.

Play with friends and people of all the world in realtime (in development).

```

Prototype of Jet Lee, "The One" Movie. :)

The game could not be finished, it's a preview of its possibilities. We want to add multiplayer and things like "memes" when someone kills another. Make it funnier.

Here are attached versions for WegGL, Windows and Mac. Please enjoy and give us your feedback.

```
